about_the_game:
Into is an action puzzle game with a plethora of chase battles. In the game, you are a student. On an ordinary morning, you were supposed to wake up in your bed, but now you wake up in a strange place with several batteries and a camera in hand. All the display devices here are guiding you to place the battery in front of a small pile of stones. During the adventure, you will encounter all unknown creatures, decipher puzzles, and converse with some "people" who are surprised by your arrival. In order to survive, you can only constantly explore and try to find a way to escape this unfamiliar world.

"Into" is a game that combines RPG Maker style decryption elements, meta elements, and the initial kill of I WANNA games.

The protagonist in the game has the ability to move, run, jump, and attack easily, and you will face various difficulties and challenges that require the use of wisdom and action to solve. Games lack skills, and you need to rely on your own observation and courage to overcome difficulties.

The world of the game is set to three main maps, namely Port, Laboratory, and Home. The main area for players to play is the port, which includes seven mini maps, each with its own unique style and region. You can adventure and explore in this world, solving various mysteries.

In terms of plot, Into focuses on the timeline and drives the development of the plot through interaction and decryption. At the beginning of the story, the protagonist wakes up in the first area of the port, with the identity of a "battery delivery person". Throughout the game, you will gradually understand what happened before and engage in conversations and interactions with various NPCs. The plot is interspersed with many unexpected events and puzzles, and players need to gradually unravel the truth.

The game is of moderate difficulty and suitable for players who enjoy careful observation. You need to pay attention to every detail and clue. The game has multiple endings for you to trigger according to different choices, and different endings can be triggered based on player interaction and investigation.

Into is a challenging action puzzle game that reveals the truth of the story through exploration and decryption. In this world full of danger and mystery, you need to remain vigilant, be careful in dealing with every challenge, and try your best to escape this place.

... or perhaps there are other options?
